summary: Luxembourg, officially the Grand Duchy of Luxembourg, is a small landlocked country in Western Europe, bordered by Belgium, Germany, and France. Its capital, Luxembourg City, is an important seat of the European Union. Luxembourg has a unique blend of French and German influences in its culture and languages. With an area of 2,586 square kilometers and a population of about 672,000, it's one of Europe's smallest and least-populated countries, but has the highest population growth rate. Luxembourg is a democracy led by Grand Duke Henri. It has a strong economy and is one of the richest countries globally. It's also a founding member of the EU, OECD, UN, NATO, and Benelux.
title: Luxembourg
